snippet.title: Go Kart Rally (PS2 Gameplay)
snippet.description:
Go Kart Rally (PS2) - Kart: 1 - Cup: Amateur

Battle your way to the top of the rankings and become the champion of the Go-Karting circuits!
Go Kart Rally puts you in the driving seat against some fiendishly competitive opponents on the circuit after circuit of neck-and-neck, bumper-to-bumper, fast and furious karting.
Choose from an exhaustive line-up of karts and battle it out in Tournament mode, get that all-important practice in Quick Race mode or go all out for the killer records in the Time Trials.
Have you got what it takes to make it to the top?
